title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
and interact with the different NPCs to trigger different updates and journal entries.

Ulma, the leader of a small tribe of monster hunters can be found in Rivington. The leader of the Tribe of Gur asks you to save their children in Cazador's Palace. While exploring Fraygo's Flophouse you can overhear 2 vampires discussing a party in Cazador's Palace. Dalyria and Petras can be encountered at Fraygo's Flophouse.

Interact with them to additional dialogue and information related to Astarion's que
